stats.passive2: Sapping Barbs: Grants 60 health regeneration and 45 mana regeneration for 5 seconds whenever you take damage from a monster. Additionally, monsters who attack you bleed for 5% of their maximum health over 3 seconds (capped at 150 damage). Sapping Barbs cannot deal lethal damage.
stats.passive3: Conservation: You generate Conservation stacks every 1.5 seconds, up to 80. Killing a large monster will consume up to 40 stacks and grant 1 per stack consumed. You may only be in possession of 1 Gold Income item.
stats.passive4: Trap Detection: Nearby stealthed enemy traps are revealed.
stats.active: Unique : Hunter's Ward: Places a  Stealth Ward that reveals the surrounding area for 180 seconds (600 range) (180 second cooldown).
